channel.title: 554 client Problem
channel.description: I'm having problems with my client. It stops loading at 6% so it won't load the log in screen.

item.title: 554 client Problem
item.dc:creator: @yourusername yourusername
item.description:
@yourusername wrote:

Hmm this is what happens when i close the client does this mean anything

Warning! fileondisk c:\rscache\cache554\random.dat not closed correctly using cl
ose(). Auto-closing instead.
Shutdown complete - clean:true

Read full topic

well i recommend you do something else until i or some one else puts some tutorials out.

item.title: 554 client Problem
item.dc:creator: @yourusername yourusername
item.description:
@yourusername wrote:

[quote=“i pk girls, post:5, topic:306899”][quote author=orionscape 525 link=topic=403072.msg2985665#msg2985665 date=1254952970]

TheGameClient.png778×536

go silentcj![br][br][size=1]Posted on: October 07, 2009, 04:03:49 pm[/size][hr]im ader but it pissis me off that idk why he got muted plz tell me myfriends mad he wants his accb back!
[/quote]randomness much?[br][br][size=1]Posted on: October 07, 2009, 04:15:32 pm[/size][hr][quote author=yourusername link=topic=403072.msg2985677#msg2985677 date=1254953605]

I’m having problems with my client. It stops loading at 6% so it won’t load the log in screen.

are you using mine?

I tried yours it just says connecting to update server and don’t load past that.
[/quote]

Cache is in right spot? servers running before you open client?
try changing 127.0.0.1 to ur ip in client.java in client folder[/quote]
I did and it will say it received my connection but it won’t load.

Read full topic
